Uses of Interface
com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.ServiceOperations

  • Packages that use ServiceOperations 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management
    This package contains the management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute
    This package contains the service management compute class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.mediaservices
    This package contains the scheduler management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.network
    This package contains the service network management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.scheduler
    This package contains the scheduler management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql
    This package contains the sql management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.storage
    This package contains the storage management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.websites
    This package contains the websites management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.scheduler
    This package contains the scheduler class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.

    • Uses of ServiceOperations in com.microsoft.windowsazure.management

      Classes in com.microsoft.windowsazure.management that implement ServiceOperations 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AffinityGroupOperationsImpl
      Operations for managing affinity groups in your subscription.
      class  LocationOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for listing the available data center locations for a hosted service in your subscription.
      class  ManagementCertificateOperationsImpl
      You can use management certificates, which are also known as subscription certificates, to authenticate clients attempting to connect to resources associated with your Azure subscription.
      class  RoleSizeOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for listing the available role sizes for VMs in your subscription.
      class  SubscriptionOperationsImpl
      Operations for listing subscription details.

      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the deployments in your subscription.
      class  ExtensionImageOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the service and virtual machine extension images in your publisher subscription.
      class  HostedServiceOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the hosted services beneath your subscription.
      class  LoadBalancerOperationsImpl
      The Compute Management API includes operations for managing the load balancers for your subscription.
      class  OperatingSystemOperationsImpl
      Operations for determining the version of the Azure Guest Operating System on which your service is running.
      class  ServiceCertificateOperationsImpl
      Operations for managing service certificates for your subscription.
      class  VirtualMachineDiskOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the disks in your subscription.
      class  VirtualMachineExtensionOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the virtual machine extensions in your subscription.
      class  VirtualMachineOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the virtual machines in your subscription.
      class  VirtualMachineOSImageOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the OS images in your subscription.
      class  VirtualMachineVMImageOperationsImpl
      The Service Management API includes operations for managing the virtual machine templates in your subscription.

    • Uses of ServiceOperations in com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

      Classes in com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql that implement ServiceOperations 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DacOperationsImpl
      Includes operations for importing and exporting Azure SQL Databases into and out of Azure blob storage.
      class  DatabaseCopyOperationsImpl
      Represents the SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing SQL Server database copies for a subscription.
      class  DatabaseOperationOperationsImpl
      The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for getting database operations.
      class  DatabaseOperationsImpl
      Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Databases.
      class  FirewallRuleOperationsImpl
      The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing the server-level Firewall Rules for Azure SQL Database Servers.
      class  QuotaOperationsImpl
      The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for getting Azure SQL Database Server quotas.
      class  RecoverableDatabaseOperationsImpl
      Contains operations for getting Azure SQL Databases that can be recovered.
      class  RecoverDatabaseOperationsImpl
      Contains the operation to create recovery requests for Azure SQL Databases.
      class  RestorableDroppedDatabaseOperationsImpl
      Contains operations for getting dropped Azure SQL Databases that can be restored.
      class  RestoreDatabaseOperationsImpl
      Contains the operation to create restore requests for Azure SQL Databases.
      class  ServerOperationsImpl
      Contains methods to allow various operations on Azure SQL Database Servers.
      class  ServiceObjectiveOperationsImpl
      This class provides methods to get a specific service objective by using its ID or to List all of the service objectives on a server.
